reply_to_text: ייצוג ישראל באירוויזיון 2021 היה מדהים!

text: Winning both X Factor and HaKokhav HaBa is incredible!

text: Her military service in the IDF bands was so inspiring!

reply_to_text: Her military service in the IDF bands was so inspiring!

text: His work with 'The High Windows' was revolutionary for Israeli rock!
